title: Mahatma and the mad boy
creator_credit: Ismail Merchant and Merchant Ivory Productions
brief_description: A comment on poverty and wealth filmed in Bombay, the central characters being the “mad” boy, his monkey and a statue of Mahatma Ghandi. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
